txt_en: A merry heart goes all the way.
txt_cn: 心旷神怡，事事顺利。

txt_en: when life gets you down, just keep moving.
txt_cn: 当生活遇到瓶颈，继续向前就对了。——《料理鼠王》

txt_en: Fearless is having fears but jumping anyway.
txt_cn: 无畏是心有所惧，但仍勇往直前。 ——泰勒·斯威夫特

txt_en: You reap what you sow.
txt_cn: 种瓜得瓜，种豆得豆。

txt_en: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
txt_cn: 生命中最值得珍惜的便是彼此。——奥黛丽·赫本

txt_en: Quick at meal, quick at work.
txt_cn: 吃得快，做得快。

txt_en: Sometimes things have to fall apart to make way for better things.
txt_cn: 有时候要到达谷底，才会慢慢变好。

txt_en: You are beautiful just as you are.
txt_cn: 你本来就很美。

txt_en: Don't be afraid to be yourself. Follow your own path.
txt_cn: 不要害怕做与众不同的自己，走自己的路。

txt_en: There's nothing you can do that can't be done.
txt_cn: 没有什么是你能做却做不到的。——披头士乐队

txt_en: What we do willingly is easy.
txt_cn: 世上无难事，只要肯登攀。

txt_en: Never doubt that you are valuable and powerful.
txt_cn: 永远都不要质疑你自己的价值和能力。——艾玛·沃特森

txt_en: Be slow to promise and be quick to perform.
txt_cn: 勿轻诺，诺必果。

txt_en: Virtue is the only true nobility.
txt_cn: 唯有美德是真正高贵的。

txt_en: To be a happy man.
txt_cn: 做一个幸福的人。

txt_en: Care and diligence bring luck.
txt_cn: 谨慎和勤奋，带来好运气。

txt_en: A wise head makes a close mouth.
txt_cn: 真人不露相，露相非真人。

txt_en: The only person standing on your way is you.
txt_cn: 唯一能阻碍你的人，是你自己。 ——《黑天鹅》

txt_en: Go ahead. Take the chance.
txt_cn: 去吧，去抓住机会。

txt_en: Spring is when life's alive in everything.
txt_cn: 春天是万物复苏的时节。

txt_en: Eventually, you'll learn to cry that on the inside.
txt_cn: 终有一天，你会学会让泪往心里流。——《破产姐妹》

txt_en: Every cloud has a silver lining.
txt_cn: 天无绝人之路。

txt_en: Time is a bird flying into eternity.
txt_cn: 时间是一只永远在飞翔的鸟。

txt_en: If you obey all the rules, you'll miss all the fun.
txt_cn: 凡事都墨守成规，就毫无乐趣了。

txt_en: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
txt_cn: 别让昨日之事占据今日太多时间。
